channel.title: Comunistando — Feed Geral
channel.description: Breaking News do mundo socialista (feed geral)

item.title: 【PT】 Education, health fees among key concerns
item.description: 【PT】 China to legislate on preschool education

item.title: 【PT】 Education, health fees among key concerns
item.description: 【PT】 China to legislate on preschool education

item.title: 【PT】 International group praises green revival
item.description: 【PT】 A high-level international advisory body applauded China's efforts to improve the environment and suggested a 15-year strategy against pollution in a draft recommendation report on Monday.

item.title: 【PT】 Fuselage Flaws Found on 14 of Russia’s Superjet Airliners
item.description: 【PT】 According to Izvestia, structural elements known as stringers, which reinforce the fuselage, were not properly secured in the section between the cockpit and the passenger door.

item.title: 【PT】 From War Surge to Slump: Is the Russian Economy Heading Toward Recession?
item.description: 【PT】 The Russian economy is still posting GDP growth, but the war-driven boost from heavy budget spending is fading.

item.title: 【PT】 Scroll-Shaped Skyscraper Design Wins Vote to Replace Iconic Novy Arbat Building in Moscow
item.description: 【PT】 The skyscraper will replace the Soviet-era Council for Mutual Economic Assistance building, which was deemed structurally unsound in October.

item.title: 【PT】 Cuba: EEUU retira visas a estudiantes opuestos a genocidio en Gaza
item.description: 【PT】 La Habana, 26 ago (Prensa Latina) El retiro de visas a estudiantes extranjeros constituye otro esfuerzo del gobierno de Estados Unidos por callar la denuncia ante el crimen que comete hoy Israel en palestina, consideró el canciller de Cuba, Bruno Rodríguez. Th

item.title: 【PT】 Palestina acusa a Israel y reclama a EEUU adoptar medidas
item.description: 【PT】 Ramala, 26 ago (Prensa Latina) La presidencia palestina denunció hoy la escalada de violencia israelí en la ocupada Cisjordania y reclamó al gobierno de Estados Unidos detener los crímenes de su principal aliado en Oriente Medio. The post Palestina acusa a Isr

item.title: 【PT】 Suspenden en Bolivia audiencia sobre detención preventiva de Áñez
item.description: 【PT】 La Paz, 26 ago (Prensa Latina) Una audiencia para considerar la detención preventiva de la expresidenta de facto Jeanine Áñez en el caso Sacaba, fue suspendida hoy tras la presentación por parte de su defensa de una excepción sobreviniente de incompetencia mat

item.title: 【PT】 Peacock Chosen as Symbol of 12th National Games
item.description: 【PT】 (KPL) The Organizing Committee of the 12th National Games has officially adopted the design, logo, mascot, and motto for the upcoming “Vientiane Games 2025.” The committee announced that the lucky animal, the peacock, will serve as the symbol of the event.
